channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Full SNAP benefits start to go out even as the Trump administration appeals

item.title: Judge rules Trump administration failed to meet legal requirements for deploying troops to Portland
Rivian gives RJ Scaringe a new pay package worth up to $5B
item.description: The company canceled a similar-sized award from 2021, when EV optimism was sky-high, due to the "unlikeliness" that the associated goals could be met.

item.description: In one case, 23-year-old Zane Shamblin had a conversation with ChatGPT that lasted more than four hours.
